entry.title: Where The Lavender Grows Wild
entry.summary:
Author: rose_quartz_queen

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 26,949Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 43

Summary: "From his vantage point on the museum steps, Buck can see Eddie for a little longer than Eddie can see him, and he watches as Eddie scans the crowd. Buck’s heart flutters in his chest, feeling like it's going to explode. He can still go home, he thinks, he can still leave. If he turns around right now, Buck can go home before Eddie even knows he was there. He can pack up his locker at work and leave, just like he did in Pennsylvania and South America. "After a not-quite-unexpected kiss, Buck and Eddie finally begin their journey as more than friends. However, as the pair get to know each other in a new way, Buck must finally come to terms with and heal from the past he has worked so hard to bury.A slow-burn fic exploring what it means to fall in love and find happiness after trauma.

entry.title: best friends, ex-friends 'til the end (better off as lovers)
entry.summary:
Author: drakesword

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 81,821Chapters: 31/40Kudos: 94

Summary: Sometimes, Eddie feels so guilty that he throws up. He doesn’t mean to, but it’s like all the guilt and shame in his stomach overflows until he can’t contain it anymore, and it spills out of him.When he spends time with Buck, the guilt is there too.It’s there when he avoids his touch, while he pretends not to see the hurt expression in Buck’s face. It’s there when he tells him that, really, he’s fine. It’s there when he asks Buck to play basketball or watch some football with him instead of letting himself just listen to him ramble for hours and hours.It goes to sleep with him and wakes him up in the morning. It creeps itself into every corner of his body, and eventually settles under his skin like a second layer. Or; AU where Buck and Eddie meet in middle school and quickly become best friends. But as they grow up alongside each other, their dynamic evolves more and more into something Eddie is not quite ready to face.

entry.title: Fire is love
entry.summary:
Author: Ilove911onABC

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 9,919Chapters: 8/20Kudos: 20

Summary: Buck and Eddie are both secretly signed up for a reality dating show—Buck by his sister Maddie, Eddie by his sister Sofia. Shocked to find each other there, they play along and date other contestants, but jealousy and chemistry keep pulling them back together. A twist pairs them on a date, where long-hidden feelings finally surface.

entry.title: The Good I’ll Do
entry.summary:
Author: ScribblesAfterDark

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 15,715Chapters: 11/24Kudos: 127

Summary: “I leave in a week,” Eddie said quietly. “Minimum Five-month deployment.”The spoon clattered against the counter, the sharp sound cutting through the air. Buck’s jaw tightened, his eyes narrowing with something too tangled to be just anger. “Five months? You were supposed to be done in three. No more deployments…We were supposed to finally settle down. Put down some roots. Be on the same fucking continent for more than a few months at a time.”Or, They survived deployments and the kind of chaos only Buck could attract. Falling in love should’ve been the easy part. Now married and raising Christopher, they’ve finally built the family they once only dreamed about…except Eddie’s been deployed again, and long-distance is proving tougher than any mission.

entry.title: I Didn’t Mean to Be Something I’m Not Supposed To, but I Am. I Am.
entry.summary:
Author: schrijverr

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 82,060Chapters: 20/23Kudos: 426

Summary: After everything Buck and Eddie have gone through together, the marriage that was once just convenience is now real. They’re boyfriend-husbands, trying to figure out what their life looks like now that they’re dating and learning to be an actual couple.However, trouble arises with the promised trip back home to El Paso for the summer. Eddie is not ready to come out to his parents and Buck supports him in that. Still, El Paso is not the place where either of them have been their best and tensions arise between them when having to exist in the influence sphere of the Diaz parents. Everything that has happened between them catches up as personal histories, insecurities and unresolved issues float back up to the surface. AKA: The terrible, horrible, no good, very bad El Paso trip where Buck and Eddie's marriage of convenience has become a secret relationship instead.

entry.title: kill my time
entry.summary:
Author: lifelessframe

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,409Chapters: 2/6Kudos: 4

Summary: Eddie's gay. Which is fine. Great, even, at least Chris said it was.Eddie has tried, really, really hard, to let Buck know how much he loves him. But every time he is close to, the damn fire alarm goes off. And he could wait, he could wait for the shift to be over so they can calmly talk about it when they are driving home, or when they are making dinner, or any other time. Scratch that, he actually can't wait, because he knows for a fact that, tomorrow, Tommy is going to ask Buck to marry him.Eddie is losing his mind.----Or 5 times Eddie is trying + 1 time he isn't

entry.title: Sorry I'm So Clingy (I Don't Mean To Be A Lot)
entry.summary:
Author: stonyismyotp

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,788Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 10

Summary: "Buck couldn’t help but stare at Eddie and Christopher with a little bit of envy. At first, it felt like gazing at the stars, warm, peaceful, and breathtakingly beautiful. Then, a pang of jealousy struck him through the heart, so sudden that the smile dropped from his face in seconds. He missed Abby, missed getting to hold her, missed having somebody to be with after a hard shift. Buck isn’t completely sure when he started getting used to that feeling, but somewhere along the way, he got dependent on it. And, Buck hates himself for it."orA one shot set post-season 2 episode 3: help is not coming. Buck is dreading going home to Abby's empty apartment, but then Eddie invites him to come inside for a drink.(title: drew barrymore by sza)

entry.title: Buck's Big New Adventure.
entry.summary:
Author: Anonymous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 16,769Chapters: 5/?Kudos: 80

Summary: In a slight AU of the 9-1-1 world; where the rich have Slaves, our favorite firefighter Eddie is desperate enough to do the unthinkable. He's still the same broke firefighter, but now in a city that runs on image and influence, he needs a loan, badly to keep a roof over Chris's head, and there's only one way in: a private party for the powerful, where slaves are the latest status symbol.So for just one night, Eddie will ask his best friend, Evan 'Buck' Buckley to do the unthinkable and become a Slave. It's just for one night, just for show.Eddie will get the loan and tomorrow Buck will go back to being Buck. Right?

entry.title: Of Kidnappings, Cherry Red Suckers, Apocalypse Apologies, & a Giant Bag Full of....
entry.summary:
Author: Firefawn

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 8,000Chapters: 1/12Kudos: 32

Summary: If Buck thought the aftermath of the lawsuit was bad, it had nothing – absolutely nothing – on the Winchesters barreling into his life, finding out the apocalypse was imminent, that his own death was a seal, and a demon hitting on him.He really should have realized that when an angel shows up to stop you from throwing yourself off a bridge, that it isn’t always a good thing.----After the lawsuit, Buck is back at work, hoping to reconcile. Only...it doesn't go as planned. His family hates him and after a lifetime of rejection it's one hit too many. Buck plans his goodbye…only a certain angel stops him, 'borrows' him, hands him the Winchester-patented starter's guide to hunting manual, and gives him purpose again. Too bad that angel was so busy saving Buck, they forgot about the goodbye letters left in the loft.---Buck rubbed at the bridge of his nose tiredly. "I'm pretty sure this is kidnapping."Dean scoffed. Sam shot him a look "Think of it as adult babysitting."Gabriel waggled a bottle of top shelf bourbon from his perch on the TV stand. "With booze!"Right. Buck eyed his new...friend, warily. "Okay, kidnapping adjacent."

entry.title: The man I buried, the man I found.
entry.summary:
Author: Noasshowaddiction

Rating: Teen And Up AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,317Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 13

Summary: Evan Buckley buried the love of his life years ago. Eddie Diaz’s death was the wound Buck never recovered from—the folded flag, the funeral, the medals pressed into his hands were all he had left.Except Eddie isn’t dead.When Eddie walks into the 118 as their newest firefighter, Buck’s world comes crashing down all over again. Grief collides with longing, fury with love, and suddenly Buck is forced to face the man he mourned, the man who promised he’d come back, and the man who let him believe he never would.Working side by side should be impossible. Pretending they’re just coworkers is unbearable. And when secrets, old promises, and new dangers come to light, Buck has to decide whether the man he buried is the same one he’s found—or if some ghosts can never be forgiven.

entry.title: Gold Rush
entry.summary:
Author: IllustrationofWinter

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,385Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 80

Summary: "I am so sorry I'm late."That was not Shannon's voice.That was a deep, handsome voice.Could a voice be handsome?Buck looked up and was immediately struck by the most gorgeous man he had ever laid eyes on. It almost felt like slow motion, the way he walked into the room with a nervous grin on his face. His tight LAFD shirt hugged his shoulders as he made his way over to Chris.Chris, who was smiling up at him. "Dad!"Ah. The elusive Mr. Diaz.Shannon did not say her ex-husband was this hot. He almost felt a little betrayed.OR: Buck is Chris's 4th-grade teacher and finally gets to meet his hot father.

entry.title: Lighthouse
entry.summary:
Author: IllustrationofWinter

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,881Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 85

Summary: "Buck, what... happened to us?"Buck let out a pitiful laugh as he shrugged. "You got a girlfriend."Shit. The way he said that was way too revealing.Eddie looked taken aback by that, blinking a few times. "Do you not like Ana?""I've only met her once, Eds. I don't think I can really -""I didn't like Taylor."Buck snorted. "Yeah, you made that very clear.""No, I mean, I didn't like her."OR: Eddie is dating Ana, which Buck is unsurpisingly not handling well.

entry.title: What Came Spilling Out That Day (Was The Truth)
entry.summary:
Author: madame_bingo

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,198Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 11

Summary: God, Eddie was glad he wasn't here. He was glad that if anyone had to be on this plane that it was him and not Buck, or Bobby, or Chim, or Hen. But especially not Buck. Buck, who in less than 24 hours was going to have to explain to Christopher what had happened. Who in less than an hour was going to be his son’s legal guardian and he wouldn't even know it. Buck, who was expecting a call soon. or When Eddie's plane goes down, he leaves Buck a voicemail telling him how he feels, after all, he was about to die. Only he didn't die. And when he returns, Buck doesn't say anything about the voicemail and Eddie assumes that mean Buck just isn't interested.

entry.title: Morocco
entry.summary:
Author: IllustrationofWinter

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,037Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 36

Summary: Eddie smirked at him. He shouldn't do that. Not when Buck couldn't control what he was saying. What if he told him he was hot out loud?Maybe he should beat himself to it."You're really hot!"Nailed it."Thanks. You are too." Eddie's smirk grew into a shy grin. His cheeks were rosy. His eyes were glittering."You're really beautiful."Eddie had nothing to say to that, just took another sip of his beer with that same happy smile.Or -Maybe he hadn't said that out loud.OR: Buck takes Eddie out to a bar to celebrate his moving back from Texas. Some drunken shenanigans ensue.

entry.title: Summer knights
entry.summary:
Author: mielydrama

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,303Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 44

Summary: “I never told you about my first kiss, did I?”The cold beer wets the coffee table when Eddie sets it there. He doesn’t know how he got to this point in conversation. Buck was talking about his first girlfriend, probably when he was 14, but he didn’t remember her name and that made Eddie laugh a bit too hard as Buck watched him fondly.“With Shannon, right?”“Well, technically yes but… not really”.OREddie tells Buck about his /practiced/ first kiss. With a boy.The story is too familiar to Buck, even if Eddie doesn’t know.
